summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Valentine invitation app with 3D teddy bear. All core features working perfectly including 3D animations, paper unfolding, button interactions, confetti effects, and mobile responsiveness.
passed_tests: 3D teddy bear renders with Three.js primitives
Envelope with heart seal visible and clickable
Click envelope transitions directly to paper unfolding
Paper shows correct question: 'Koco, my love, will you be my Valentine?'
Yes/No buttons positioned correctly on paper
Placeholder image area below buttons as specified
No button dodging behavior with 'Nice try' caption
Yes button triggers success screen with confetti animation
Mobile responsiveness across all screen sizes
Save functionality downloads valentine as PNG
All data-testid attributes present for automation
